channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Insight Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Insight Platform

item.title: CVE-2024-8042|2024-09-09T15:02:38.681Z -- rapid7 -- insight%20platform
item.description: Rapid7 Insight Platform versions between November 2019 and August 14, 2024 suffer from missing authorization issues whereby an attacker can intercept local requests to set the name and description of a new user group. This could potentially lead to an empty user group being added to the incorrect customer. This vulnerability is remediated as of August 14, 2024.
